entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
